snippet.title: Event Horizon
snippet.description:
Event Horizon is is now up on Steam Greenlight. Please jump over and vote of us on there. Tell your friends.
With enough votes we’ll be able to sell the game via Steam which means we’ll be able to share it with a lot more people, and it will really help us get the backing and resources we need to keep improving the game. Every vote counts!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=654840311
